Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, offering a level of quality and functionality that is unparalleled. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or needs. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $125. I trust that you will find immense value in it. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
